fields.duty: Provide guidance to the team with respect to project expectations, priorities etc. in order to meet department vision and objectives
1. Supervise the development and implementation of GIS Projects
2. Guide the entire implementation team during the project implementation aligning with department vision and objectives.
3. Present project status, expected outputs to management as and when required
1. Responsible for managing the assigned GIS Project
2. Primary point of contact for project queries and presentations
3. Responsible for aligning with requirements from Primary Point Of Contact
4. Provide weekly and on demand project status to the  management
5. Coordinating with stakeholders during project execuition
6. Supervising entire project implementation
7. Plan centralized storage for managing output and deliveries of the projects
1. Primary point of contact for providing project requirements to Primary TL
2. Supporting Primary TL in coordinating with stakeholders and project inputs
3. Active participation in reviewing and approving project deliveries
4. Active participation for UAT (User Acceptance Testing)
5. Providing all necessary support to Primary TL for timely implementing of the project
6. Responding to business queries from the management as and when needed in coordination with Primary TL (e.g. status, presentation etc.)
Support Point of Contact #1 during his/her unavailability
1. Developer primary responsible for development and implementation
2. Perform tasks as per the directions of the team leader
3. Respond to queries related to development and implementation
1. Developer responsible for development and implementation
2. Perform tasks as per the directions of the team leader
3. Respond to queries related to development and implementation during unavailability of Main Developer #1
1. Responsible for developing documentaton for the concerned project as per the instructions from the TL
2.The assigned team member under database team will be responsible for database documentation
3.The assigned team member under application team will be responsible for application documentation
4.The Primary TL and Responsible Developer (RD) should include documentation in their implementation plans
